name: Witch House Trials
description:
WITCH HOUSE TRIALS.

An immersive first person Survival Horror Game from @afterworldstudios

Navigate your way throught the Witches Den as you try to rescue your friends and escape, but be warned this lair is rigged with booby traps and getting out alive will be difficult. Solve the Riddle, Save your friends and Escape the Witches Lair!...
